strapiPost.title: Fall Vacation Anyone?
strapiPost.content:
With the fading of summer, air travel from XNA has slowed due to the responsibilities that come along with fall, but one thing has stayed the same: the low fare trips to locations all over the country. 

  • Traveling again: There has been a general decline in passengers due to the pandemic, but numbers are on the up and up. XNA reported more than twice the number of people boarded flights this August than last. 
  • Incentive to go: At the end of August XNA was 8,000 passengers short of the total amount of passengers in 2020. With the cost of flights staying low, the airport projects more than 500,000 passengers in 2021.

Read the full Fare Flight article HERE.
